entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
